mapper.select:
select id,col1,col2,col3,col4,col5,col6,col7,col8,col9,col10,col11,col12,col13,col14,col15,col16,col17,col18,col19,step from t_ext_59_xmzb where 1=1
and col1 like '%' #{params.col1} '%'
and col2 like '%' #{params.col2} '%'
and col5 like '%' #{params.col5} '%'
and step = #{params.step}
order by id
